actions.name: CancelTaskExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel execution of a sync task

actions.name: CreateAgent
actions.description: Grants permission to activate an agent that you have deployed on your host

actions.name: CreateLocationEfs
actions.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for an Amazon EFS file system

actions.name: CreateLocationFsxLustre
actions.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for an Amazon Fsx Lustre

actions.name: CreateLocationFsxOntap
actions.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for Amazon FSx for ONTAP

actions.name: CreateLocationFsxOpenZfs
actions.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for Amazon FSx for OpenZFS

actions.name: CreateLocationFsxWindows
actions.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for an Amazon FSx Windows File Server file system

actions.name: CreateLocationHdfs
actions.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for an Amazon Hdfs

actions.name: CreateLocationNfs
actions.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for a NFS file system

actions.name: CreateLocationObjectStorage
actions.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for a self-managed object storage bucket

actions.name: CreateLocationS3
actions.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for an Amazon S3 bucket

actions.name: CreateLocationSmb
actions.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for an SMB file system

actions.name: CreateTask
actions.description: Grants permission to create a sync task

actions.name: DeleteAgent
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an agent

actions.name: DeleteLocation
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a location used by AWS DataSync

actions.name: DeleteTask
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a sync task

actions.name: DescribeAgent
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata such as name, network interfaces, and the status (that is, whether the agent is running or not) about a sync agent

actions.name: DescribeLocationEfs
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon EFS sync location

actions.name: DescribeLocationFsxLustre
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon FSx Lustre sync location

actions.name: DescribeLocationFsxOntap
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon FSx for ONTAP sync location

actions.name: DescribeLocationFsxOpenZfs
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon FSx OpenZFS sync location

actions.name: DescribeLocationFsxWindows
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon FSx Windows sync location

actions.name: DescribeLocationHdfs
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon HDFS sync location

actions.name: DescribeLocationNfs
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information, about a NFS sync location

actions.name: DescribeLocationObjectStorage
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata about a self-managed object storage server location

actions.name: DescribeLocationS3
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as bucket name, about an Amazon S3 bucket sync location

actions.name: DescribeLocationSmb
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information, about an SMB sync location

actions.name: DescribeTask
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata about a sync task

actions.name: DescribeTaskExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to view metadata about a sync task that is being executed

actions.name: ListAgents
actions.description: Grants permission to list agents owned by an AWS account in a region specified in the request

actions.name: ListLocations
actions.description: Grants permission to list source and destination sync locations

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags that have been added to the specified resource

actions.name: ListTaskExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to list executed sync tasks

actions.name: ListTasks
actions.description: Grants permission to list of all the sync tasks

actions.name: StartTaskExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to start a specific invocation of a sync task

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to apply a key-value pair to an AWS resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from the specified resource

actions.name: UpdateAgent
actions.description: Grants permission to update the name of an agent

actions.name: UpdateLocationHdfs
actions.description: Grants permission to update an HDFS sync Location

actions.name: UpdateLocationNfs
actions.description: Grants permission to update an NFS sync Location

actions.name: UpdateLocationObjectStorage
actions.description: Grants permission to update a self-managed object storage server location

actions.name: UpdateLocationSmb
actions.description: Grants permission to update a SMB sync location

actions.name: UpdateTask
actions.description: Grants permission to update metadata associated with a sync task

actions.name: UpdateTaskExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to update execution of a sync task
